DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to devise the method to reduce displacement of a left-sided double-lumen tube during patient positioning.
DOC.brief_title: The Method to Reduce Displacement of Double-lumen Tube
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing thoracic surgery that require the placement of leftsided doublelumen tubes intraluminal lesion of left bronchus very distorted anatomy of tracheobronchial tree
